name: density
description: Used to identify rocks and minerals by comparing mass and volume.

name: rate of erosion

variables.amount_eroded: mass or volume of material removed

description: Measures how quickly material is removed from a landscape.

name: carbon cycle flux

variables.carbon_transferred: amount of carbon moved between stores

description: Describes movement of carbon between Earthâ€™s major stores.

name: earthquake magnitude
description: Simplified form of the Richter scale used to estimate earthquake strength.

name: wave speed

variables.wave_speed: speed of seismic or ocean waves

description: Used to calculate the speed of seismic waves through Earth.

name: rainfall intensity
description: Measures how heavy rainfall is over a given period.

name: river discharge

variables.discharge: volume of water flowing per second

description: Calculates how much water flows through a river channel.

name: weathering rate
description: Measures how quickly rock breaks down due to weathering.

name: albedo
description: Indicates how reflective a surface is, important in climate science.

name: global warming potential

variables.atmospheric_lifetime: how long the gas stays in the atmosphere

description: Compares the warming effect of greenhouse gases relative to CO2.
